segments.text: Oh, this kitchen is a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying that stupid plate like it's the only thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the water running? It's flooding!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle everywhere, damaging everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing like reckless fools.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's unstable, boy's about to tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Grabbing cookies like thieves in their own home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just enabling him, hand out beggingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside mocks this indoor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open, water ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone's going to get hurt, mark my words.
segments.speaker: PAR
